    • Method Detail

      • combineSegments

        public void combineSegments()
        Normal users of this class will use simple parameter names. In some cases, for example, when processing IMAP protocol messages, individual segments of a multi-segment name (specified by RFC 2231) will be encountered and passed to the set(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method. After all these segments are added to this ParameterList, they need to be combined to represent the logical parameter name and value. This method will combine all segments of multi-segment names. Normal users should never need to call this method.
        Since:
        JavaMail 1.5
